title: Participants of the reserve
description: An infinite reserve system, can be run and owned by one or more people. There is no limit to the number of people involved. Members of the reserve are called as participants. A participant must have an income source and should be financially independent from other participants in the system. It is a trust based system and hence, limit the network to people who are closely related. Suitable for an individual, a family or a joint venture business partnership.
